visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a column chart with the title 'Monthly Sales Data'. The chart should have custom colors for each column, and the axes and labels should be styled with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent monthly sales data for a year.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a column chart titled 'Monthly Sales Data'. The chart uses a custom set of colors for each column, which are specified in the 'colors' array. The x-axis represents the months of the year, with labels styled in a dark gray color and a font size of 14px. The x-axis title is styled similarly with a font size of 16px. The y-axis represents the sales data, with its title and labels also styled in dark gray with a font size of 16px and 14px, respectively. The data series includes monthly sales figures for a year, with each column colored according to the custom color palette. The legend is disabled to keep the chart clean and focused on the data. Additional configurations include settings for column padding and border width to ensure a clean and visually appealing presentation.
